item.title: Encountering AI: On the use of Generative AI in Dungeons & Dragons
item.description: This blog post delves into the use of Generative AI to lower entry barriers for novice Dungeon Masters in Dungeons & Dragons, detailing a workshop study that showcases how AI tools can enhance narrative development, character creation, and world-building.
